rateLimit.blockListSubtitle: Active windows, queued messages and manual blocks
rateLimit.configDialogSubtitle: Adjust throttling parameters for the selected module.
rateLimit.configInfoBlock: Block duration ‚Äî the amount of time the user stays blocked after exceeding the limit.
rateLimit.configInfoDescription: Every module counts requests inside the selected time window. When the count exceeds the limit, the user is blocked for the configured duration.
rateLimit.configInfoMaxRequests: Max requests ‚Äî the number of actions allowed per window before throttling starts.
rateLimit.configInfoNote: Tip: monitoring mode logs warnings only, blocking mode enforces the limits.
rateLimit.configInfoWarn: Warning threshold ‚Äî optional reminder shown when the remaining messages drop below the value.
rateLimit.configInfoWindow: Window (minutes) ‚Äî determines how long we keep counting the requests.
rateLimit.configModeHelper: Monitoring records warnings without blocking. Blocking enforces the limit and stops requests.
rateLimit.configValidationError: Please enter valid positive numbers for all required fields.
rateLimit.configWarnThresholdHint: Optional: warn users when remaining messages are less than or equal to this value.
rateLimit.description: Inspect throttling windows, review active blocks, and unblock users when necessary.
rateLimit.loadError: Failed to load rate limit data
rateLimit.loadSummaryError: Failed to load rate limit summary
rateLimit.modeEnforceHint: Blocking enforces the limit and stops requests.
rateLimit.modeMonitorHint: Monitoring logs warnings without blocking users.
rateLimit.noAccess: You do not have access to this section.
rateLimit.noData: No rate limit entries for the selected filters.
rateLimit.title: Rate Limiting Management

rateLimitEvents.description: Review warnings and blocks across modules, and apply manual sanctions.
